text.author: Peter Watts
text.title: Blingsight, Prologue
text.summary: Siri tells about an incident from his childhood, when, after recovering from brain surgery to treat epilepsy, he saved his friend Pag from bullies hitting him by brutally beating three of them with a rock.

head.s: Prologue NN prologue NN1 NOUN root
